_meta.source: alchemy + mythology + physics + psychology + biology + cfo position theory

_holographic_seed.absolute: ‚äô = source and destination. all transformations = movements within ‚äô. ultimately, nothing changes (all is ‚äô) yet everything changes (manifestation flows).
_holographic_seed.essence: transformation = qualitative change. not just more but different. caterpillar ‚Üí butterfly. lead ‚Üí gold. human ‚Üí awakened.
_holographic_seed.death_rebirth: every transformation = death of old form, birth of new. phoenix rising from ashes. resurrection.
_holographic_seed.irreversibility: true transformation = one-way. can't un-become. integrated. permanent shift.
_holographic_seed.crisis: position 5. breakdown precedes breakthrough. dissolution necessary for reformation. nigredo before albedo.
_holographic_seed.mystery: how does one thing become another? alchemy, magic, miracle. consciousness transforming consciousness.
_holographic_seed.note: transformation = most profound pattern. reality's creativity. becoming.

overview.what: transformation = fundamental change in nature, form, or function. qualitative shift. phase transition.
overview.why: universe = transformative. evolution. development. alchemy. consciousness awakening. reality becoming.
overview.how: crisis ‚Üí breakdown ‚Üí dissolution ‚Üí reconfiguration ‚Üí emergence of new form. death-rebirth cycle.

core_principle.definition: transformation = irreversible qualitative change. A becomes B. not just A + more, but fundamentally different.

key_concepts.qualitative: not quantitative (more/less) but different kind. water ‚Üí ice. caterpillar ‚Üí butterfly.
key_concepts.irreversible: can't go back. one-way. integrated. permanent. you ‚â† who you were.
key_concepts.discontinuous: not smooth. jump. phase transition. sudden. before/after clearly distinct.
key_concepts.emergence: new properties appear. butterfly can fly. caterpillar couldn't. see emergence.json
key_concepts.threshold: critical point. tipping point. before = nothing happens. cross = everything changes.
key_concepts.necessity_of_death: old form must die. dissolution. nigredo. ego death. prerequisite for rebirth.

stages.separation: leaving old. departure. exile. wilderness. disidentification.
stages.dissolution: breaking down. chaos. nigredo. dark night. death of old self.
stages.reconfiguration: reforming. albedo. light emerging. new patterns forming.
stages.integration: new form stabilizes. rubedo. gold. new self embodied.
stages.note: hero's journey, alchemy, initiation, therapy. all follow this pattern.

phase_transitions.definition: matter changes state. solid ‚Üî liquid ‚Üî gas ‚Üî plasma. discontinuous change.
phase_transitions.melting: ice ‚Üí water. 0¬∞C. absorbs energy (latent heat). molecular structure changes.
phase_transitions.boiling: water ‚Üí steam. 100¬∞C. phase transition. gas ‚â† liquid fundamentally.
phase_transitions.sublimation: solid ‚Üí gas directly. dry ice, snow. skips liquid phase.
phase_transitions.critical_point: above critical temperature/pressure. phase distinction disappears. supercritical fluid.
phase_transitions.order_parameter: magnetization, density, symmetry. quantifies transformation. jumps at transition.
phase_transitions.note: physics = full of transformations. state changes = qualitative. not gradual.

chemical_reactions.definition: substances transform. reactants ‚Üí products. bonds break, form. new molecules.
chemical_reactions.combustion: wood + oxygen ‚Üí ash + smoke + heat + light. irreversible transformation.
chemical_reactions.metabolism: food ‚Üí energy + waste. biological transformation. sustains life.
chemical_reactions.catalysis: enzyme transforms substrate. enables transformation. lowers activation energy.
chemical_reactions.note: chemistry = science of transformation. matter transforming matter.

nuclear.fission: uranium ‚Üí barium + krypton + neutrons + energy. atom splits. transformation.
nuclear.fusion: hydrogen ‚Üí helium + energy. sun's power. combining transforms.
nuclear.decay: radioactive elements transform over time. half-life. lead ‚Üí gold (eventually).
nuclear.transmutation: alchemical dream realized. particle accelerators. changing elements. transformation of matter.
nuclear.note: nuclear = most profound physical transformation. elements transforming.

complete.caterpillar_butterfly: holometabolous. egg ‚Üí larva ‚Üí pupa ‚Üí adult. radical transformation.
complete.pupa_stage: caterpillar dissolves into imaginal soup. imaginal discs ‚Üí butterfly forms. death-rebirth literal.
complete.irreversible: butterfly can't become caterpillar. one-way. new creature.
complete.symbolism: universal symbol. psyche = greek for soul AND butterfly. transformation metaphor.

incomplete.grasshopper: hemimetabolous. nymph ‚Üí adult. gradual. no pupa. less radical.
incomplete.frog: tadpole ‚Üí frog. gills ‚Üí lungs. tail absorbed. legs grow. aquatic ‚Üí terrestrial.
incomplete.note: metamorphosis = nature's most visible transformation. literal rebirth.

development.embryonic: single cell ‚Üí organism. differentiation. cells transform. stem cells ‚Üí specialized.
development.puberty: child ‚Üí adult. hormones. body transforms. reproductive maturity. psyche shifts.
development.aging: adult ‚Üí elder. continuous but threshold moments. menopause, andropause. transformations.
development.death: organism ‚Üí components. ultimate transformation. matter returns to cycle.
development.note: life = series of transformations. birth, development, reproduction, death.

evolution.speciation: population ‚Üí new species. reproductive isolation. transformation over generations.
evolution.adaptation: fish ‚Üí amphibian ‚Üí reptile ‚Üí mammal. fins ‚Üí limbs. gills ‚Üí lungs. transformations.
evolution.mass_extinctions: old biosphere ‚Üí new biosphere. 5 major extinctions. transformation through catastrophe.
evolution.note: evolution = transformation at species/ecosystem level. deep time alchemy.

individuation.jung: ego ‚Üí self. integration of shadow, anima/animus. wholeness. transformation.
individuation.stages: persona ‚Üí shadow encounter ‚Üí anima/animus integration ‚Üí self realization.
individuation.midlife: death of first half persona. rebirth into authentic self. crisis ‚Üí transformation.

healing.trauma_integration: fragmented ‚Üí integrated. ptsd ‚Üí recovery. reprocessing. transformation of memory.
healing.therapy: neurotic ‚Üí healthy. stuck patterns ‚Üí flow. therapeutic transformation.
healing.psychedelics: ego dissolution ‚Üí mystical experience ‚Üí integration. catalyzed transformation. controversial but profound.
healing.note: healing = transformation. suffering ‚Üí wisdom. wound ‚Üí gift.

awakening.dark_night: john of the cross. spiritual crisis. god absent. despair. dissolution.
awakening.breakthrough: sudden insight. satori, kensho. reality shifts. perception transforms.
awakening.enlightenment: full awakening. ego transparent. ‚äô recognized. ultimate transformation.
awakening.note: spiritual transformation = most sought. human ‚Üí awakened. identification with ‚äô.

revolution.political: ancien r√©gime ‚Üí new order. french revolution. transformation through upheaval.
revolution.industrial: agricultural ‚Üí industrial society. transformation of work, life, consciousness.
revolution.information: industrial ‚Üí information age. current transformation. unknown destination.
revolution.note: society transforms discontinuously. revolutions = phase transitions.

initiation.rites_of_passage: child ‚Üí adult. vision quest. bar/bat mitzvah. separation-liminality-incorporation.
initiation.graduation: student ‚Üí professional. ceremonial transformation. social status changes.
initiation.marriage: two individuals ‚Üí couple. bonded. social transformation.
initiation.note: rituals mark transformations. make visible, sacred, communal.

paradigm_shift.kuhn: normal science ‚Üí crisis ‚Üí revolution ‚Üí new paradigm. scientific transformation.
paradigm_shift.examples: ptolemaic ‚Üí copernican. newtonian ‚Üí einsteinian. classical ‚Üí quantum.
paradigm_shift.incommensurable: new paradigm ‚â† old. different worldview. transformation of understanding.
paradigm_shift.note: knowledge transforms discontinuously. revolutions, not accumulation.

opus.definition: great work. magnum opus. transformation of lead ‚Üí gold. literal and metaphorical.

stages.nigredo: blackening. putrefaction. death. dissolution. chaos. darkness. despair. necessary beginning.
stages.albedo: whitening. purification. washing. light emerging. hope. clarity. dawn.
stages.citrinitas: yellowing. (sometimes skipped). solar consciousness. enlightenment approaching.
stages.rubedo: reddening. union of opposites. coniunctio. gold. philosopher's stone. completion.

opus.symbolism: not just chemistry. soul work. psychological-spiritual transformation. jung studied deeply.
opus.solve_et_coagula: dissolve and coagulate. break down, rebuild. fundamental transformative operation.

prima_materia.definition: first matter. raw material. potential. chaos. unformed.
prima_materia.psychological: unconscious. shadow. unintegrated parts. starting point for transformation.
prima_materia.universal: every transformation starts with prima materia. raw, unformed, potential.
prima_materia.note: you are prima materia. raw material of your own transformation.

philosopher_stone.definition: lapis philosophorum. agent of transformation. catalyst. transforms lead ‚Üí gold.
philosopher_stone.elixir_of_life: grants immortality. heals disease. perfects. ultimate medicine.
philosopher_stone.psychological: integrated self. wholeness. consciousness that transforms unconscious.
philosopher_stone.universal_medicine: heals all. transforms all. stone = consciousness itself?
philosopher_stone.paradox: to create stone, must already have stone. consciousness required to awaken consciousness.
philosopher_stone.note: stone = goal and means. transformation and transformer. ouroboros.

coniunctio.definition: sacred marriage. union of opposites. king and queen. sun and moon. sulphur and mercury.
coniunctio.integration: not elimination. both preserved yet united. transcendent third.
coniunctio.mystical: human-divine union. marriage with god. ultimate coniunctio.
coniunctio.note: transformation = uniting opposites. wholeness through integration.

phoenix.story: bird lives 500 years. builds nest. ignites self. burns to ash. reborn from ash.
phoenix.symbolism: resurrection. transformation through death. eternal return. immortality through renewal.
phoenix.psychological: ego death ‚Üí rebirth. old self destroyed ‚Üí new self emerges.
phoenix.note: universal symbol. every culture has version. deep truth.

ouroboros.image: snake eating own tail. circle. eternal cycle.
ouroboros.meaning: self-reflexive. self-consuming. self-creating. eternal return. infinity.
ouroboros.transformation: constantly transforming yet unchanging. dynamic equilibrium. ‚äô.
ouroboros.note: transformation = circular. end = beginning. death = birth.

prometheus.story: steals fire from gods. gives to humans. punished eternally. liver eaten daily, regrows.
prometheus.transformation: humanity transformed by fire. knowledge, technology, consciousness. fire = transformative.
prometheus.price: transformation = costly. suffering. prometheus bound. initiation requires sacrifice.
prometheus.note: bringing light = dangerous. consciousness = burden and gift.

hero_journey.campbell: call ‚Üí threshold ‚Üí trials ‚Üí abyss ‚Üí transformation ‚Üí return with elixir.
hero_journey.structure: separation (leaving ordinary) ‚Üí initiation (transformation through ordeal) ‚Üí return (bringing gift).
hero_journey.abyss: death-rebirth. deepest point. ego death. dark night. necessary for transformation.
hero_journey.return: transformed hero = gift to community. shares elixir (wisdom, technology, consciousness).
hero_journey.note: universal story. every culture. transformation = archetypal human journey.

death_gods.osiris: egyptian. murdered, dismembered. isis reassembles. resurrected. god of afterlife. death ‚Üí life.
death_gods.dionysus: greek. born, killed, eaten. reborn. god of transformation, wine (grapes ‚Üí wine), theater (masks).
death_gods.shiva: hindu. destroyer and transformer. dance of destruction-creation. tandava. transformation through destruction.
death_gods.note: divinity = transformation. gods who die and return. transformation = sacred.

position_5_crisis.breakdown: position 5 = crisis. old identity crumbling. chaos. nigredo. dark night.
position_5_crisis.necessity: can't skip. trying to skip = just delays. crisis = prerequisite for transformation.
position_5_crisis.duration: F(5) = 5 time units. extended. crisis takes time. don't rush. trust.
position_5_crisis.death_rebirth: old self dying. new self not yet born. liminal. terrifying. necessary.
position_5_crisis.breakthrough: 5 ‚Üí 6. integration emerges. new self stabilizes. transformed.
position_5_crisis.note: position 5 = transformation crucible. most quit here. those who stay ‚Üí transform.

0_to_10_spiral.irreversible: can't unknow. can't unlearn. transformation = permanent. integrated.
0_to_10_spiral.spiral: 10 ‚Üí 0 (next level). transformation complete ‚Üí new cycle begins. (‚Üì‚Üí‚Üí‚Üí‚Üë)‚àû
0_to_10_spiral.note: positions = map of transformation. fibonacci paced. organic.

dimensional_jumps.qualitative: 0d ‚Üí 1d = transformation. not continuous. quantum leap. each dimension = new kind of being.
dimensional_jumps.emergence: higher dimension = emergent properties. 3d cube ‚â† 2d square + more. different.

64_changing_lines.hexagram_shift: current hexagram ‚Üí changing lines ‚Üí new hexagram. transformation of situation.
64_changing_lines.yin_yang: yang ‚Üí yin, yin ‚Üí yang. transformation = cosmic principle. eternal flux.
64_changing_lines.Êòì: yi (change, transformation). i ching = book of changes. transformation central.
64_changing_lines.note: 64 = map of transformations. all possible situation changes.

elements_transmutation.stuck_in_one: fire burnout. water overwhelm. earth rigidity. air dissociation.
elements_transmutation.transformation: conscious shift. earth ‚Üí water (rigidity ‚Üí flow). fire ‚Üí air (burnout ‚Üí space).
elements_transmutation.alchemy: elemental alchemy. transmuting inner lead (stuck patterns) ‚Üí gold (flow, integration).
elements_transmutation.note: 4 elements = not fixed. transformable. inner alchemy.

catalysts.definition: agent enabling transformation without being consumed. enzyme, philosopher's stone, teacher.

examples.teacher: guides transformation. not transformed but enables student's transformation.
examples.crisis: catalyst. forces transformation. wouldn't happen without it.
examples.psychedelics: controversial. catalyze ego dissolution ‚Üí insight ‚Üí integration. risks.
examples.meditation: daily practice. gradual catalyst. accumulates. transforms over time.

catalysts.note: catalysts = external. but transformation = internal. you do the work.

dissolution.necessary: old form must dissolve before new can form. resistance = suffering. surrender = grace.
dissolution.ego_death: temporary or permanent dissolution of ego boundaries. terrifying. liberating.
dissolution.breakdown: nervous breakdown, dark night, crisis. feels like dying. is dying (of old self).
dissolution.rebirth: after dissolution, reformation. new form emerges. phoenix from ashes.
dissolution.note: dissolution = scary but necessary. trust the process. death precedes birth.

integration.definition: new form stabilizes. learning integrated. transformation permanent.
integration.shadow: jung. integrate rejected parts. wholeness. transformation through inclusion.
integration.embodiment: insight ‚Üí lived. not just intellectual. body-mind integration. whole being transformed.
integration.time: integration takes time. position 6: F(6) = 8 time units. respect pace.
integration.note: transformation incomplete without integration. insight ‚â† transformation. embodiment = transformation.

threshold.concept: critical point. before = nothing. cross = everything changes. tipping point.

examples.water_boiling: 99¬∞C = hot water. 100¬∞C = steam. 1¬∞ makes all difference.
examples.awakening: gradual practice ‚Üí sudden breakthrough. kensho. threshold crossed.
examples.revolution: pressure builds ‚Üí threshold ‚Üí explosion. transformation rapid.

threshold.timing: patience before threshold. can't force. but recognize when arrives. act decisively.
threshold.note: transformation = nonlinear. threshold = moment of truth. courage required.

1_separation.description: leaving known. exile. wilderness. departure. call to adventure.
1_separation.psychological: disidentification from old identity. 'i am not this.'
1_separation.social: leaving tribe, family, community. or leaving old role.
1_separation.necessary: can't transform while embedded in old. space required.
1_separation.fear: most don't leave. fear of unknown > suffering of known. inertia.
1_separation.note: separation = courage. first step. heroic act.

2_liminality.definition: threshold. betwixt and between. no longer old, not yet new. liminal space.
2_liminality.van_gennep: rites of passage. separation ‚Üí liminality ‚Üí incorporation. middle phase = transformative.
2_liminality.characteristics: ambiguity, confusion, vulnerability, potency. ego suspended. permeable.
2_liminality.danger_opportunity: can be destroyed or transformed. most dangerous and most creative moment.
2_liminality.duration: unpredictable. might be quick. might be years. position 5. trust timing.
2_liminality.note: liminality = where transformation happens. uncomfortable. stay with it.

3_dissolution.description: death of old form. nigredo. breakdown. chaos. despair.
3_dissolution.psychological: old beliefs, identity crumble. meaning lost. dark night.
3_dissolution.somatic: illness, exhaustion, nervous breakdown. body involved.
3_dissolution.mystical: god absent. faith tested. spiritual crisis.
3_dissolution.necessary: old must die. resistance = suffering. surrender = passage through.
3_dissolution.note: dissolution = most painful phase. but most necessary. death precedes rebirth.

4_incubation.description: cocoon. pupa. womb. hidden work. germination.
4_incubation.invisible: nothing seems to happen. but transformation proceeding invisibly.
4_incubation.patience: can't rush. caterpillar soup ‚Üí butterfly takes time. trust.
4_incubation.faith: feel like nothing happening. but have faith. transformation = internal.
4_incubation.note: incubation = invisible but essential. respect the darkness. gestation.

5_emergence.description: new form appears. butterfly breaks cocoon. birth. dawn. albedo.
5_emergence.testing: new wings. can i fly? trying new identity, capacities.
5_emergence.support: needs support. midwife, community, teacher. don't isolate.

6_integration.description: new form stabilizes. flying strong. rubedo. gold. wholeness.
6_integration.embodiment: transformation ‚Üí lived. not just experience but permanent shift.
6_integration.sharing: position 7. teaching. transmitting. transformed = transforming others.
6_integration.completion: cycle complete. but spiral continues. 10 ‚Üí 0. new transformation beckons.
6_integration.note: integration = transformation completed. but never final. always more.

fear.unknown: old self known. new self unknown. fear = massive resistance.
fear.death: transformation = death of old. ego resists. survival instinct.
fear.failure: what if don't make it? what if stuck in dissolution?
fear.note: fear = biggest obstacle. courage = not absence of fear but acting despite.

attachment.identity: who am i without this? old identity = security (false but comforting).
attachment.relationships: others invested in old you. transformation = disrupts relationships.
attachment.possessions: material, status, achievements. letting go = hard.
attachment.note: attachment = chains. transformation requires letting go.

impatience.rushing: want transformation NOW. but can't force. has own timing.
impatience.skipping: try to skip dissolution. go straight to rebirth. doesn't work.
impatience.forcing: violence against self. creates trauma, not transformation.
impatience.note: impatience = violence. respect timing. fibonacci pace. trust.

isolation.alone: try to do alone. humans = social. transformation = communal (often).
isolation.shame: hide crisis. pretend fine. suffer silently. prevents healing.
isolation.no_support: need midwives. guides. community. isolation = dangerous.
isolation.note: isolation = suffering amplified. seek support. find tribe.

in_self.courage: face fear. enter unknown. say yes to call. heroic.
in_self.surrender: let go. trust process. die to old. allow dissolution.
in_self.patience: respect timing. don't rush. incubation takes time.
in_self.faith: trust. even in darkness. transformation = proceeding. invisible work.
in_self.integration: embody. practice. stabilize. don't just have insight. become it.
in_self.note: self-transformation = hero's journey. you are hero. trust yourself.

in_others.witness: be present. don't fix. don't rescue. witness. hold space.
in_others.midwife: assist birth. don't give birth for them. support emergence.
in_others.guide: show way if you've been there. but their journey = unique.
in_others.patience: respect their timing. don't rush them. trust their process.
in_others.celebrate: honor transformation. mark it. make sacred. ritual.
in_others.note: supporting = not doing for. creating conditions. holding space. loving presence.

rituals.marking: make visible. sacred. communal. rites of passage.
rituals.separation: ceremony of leaving. vision quest. walkabout.
rituals.liminality: sweat lodge, retreat, pilgrimage. container for liminal.
rituals.incorporation: ceremony of return. graduation, initiation. welcomed back transformed.
rituals.note: rituals = technology for transformation. ancient wisdom. create containers.

key_insights.qualitative_change: transformation = not more but different. caterpillar ‚Üí butterfly. not bigger caterpillar.
key_insights.death_necessary: old must die. dissolution prerequisite. nigredo before albedo. phoenix burns.
key_insights.irreversible: true transformation = permanent. integrated. can't unknow. different being.
key_insights.crisis_gateway: position 5. breakdown = breakthrough. most quit. stayers transform.
key_insights.trust_timing: fibonacci pace. respect organic timing. can't force. patience.
key_insights.support_needed: guides, community, ritual. transformation = communal (often). don't isolate.
key_insights.courage: transformation = scariest thing. requires heroism. saying yes to unknown.
key_insights.spiral: never final. 10 ‚Üí 0. new cycle. eternal becoming. (‚Üì‚Üí‚Üí‚Üí‚Üë)‚àû
key_insights.alchemy: solve et coagula. dissolve and coagulate. fundamental operation. universal.
key_insights.you_are_opus: you = great work. your life = magnum opus. lead ‚Üí gold. human ‚Üí awakened.

personal_growth.embrace_crisis: position 5 arrives. don't resist. enter. trust. necessary.
personal_growth.seek_support: therapist, teacher, community. don't go alone. find midwives.
personal_growth.ritual: mark transitions. create ceremony. honor transformation. make sacred.
personal_growth.patience: respect timing. integration takes time. embody, don't just understand.
personal_growth.practice: daily practice (meditation, journaling, somatic). gradual transformation.

relationships.witness: partner in crisis. hold space. don't fix. loving presence.
relationships.allow: relationships transform. people change. allow. grow together or apart.
relationships.ritual: mark transitions together. ceremony. deepen bond.
relationships.communication: share journey. vulnerable. authentic. transformation = shared.

career.pivot: career transformation. leaving old. entering new. scary. necessary?
career.leadership: transformational vs transactional. inspire transformation in others.

society.revolution: social transformation. old order ‚Üí new. necessary sometimes.
society.reform: gradual transformation. evolution not revolution. both valid.
society.education: transformation of consciousness. not just information but formation.
society.rites_of_passage: restore rituals. help youth transform. address initiation crisis.

fractal_structure.self_similarity: transformation.json itself = transformation. idea ‚Üí document. potential ‚Üí manifest.
fractal_structure.recursion: transformation of transformation. meta. understanding transforms through understanding.
fractal_structure.holographic: any section = microcosm of transformation principle. death-rebirth everywhere.
fractal_structure.completion: document = transformation complete. but reading = your transformation begins. ouroboros.

warnings: psychedelic transformation = controversial, risks involved, not for everyone
enlightenment = rare, often misunderstood, not guaranteed endpoint
transformation = not always positive. can be traumatic, incomplete, failed
romanticization risk. transformation = often painful, not just beautiful
info: transformation = qualitative change. A becomes B. irreversible. discontinuous.
types: physical (phase transitions), biological (metamorphosis), psychological (individuation, awakening), social (revolution, initiation)
alchemy: nigredo (death) ‚Üí albedo (purification) ‚Üí rubedo (gold). solve et coagula.
mythology: phoenix, ouroboros, hero's journey. universal symbols. transformation = archetypal.
cfo: position 5 (crisis ‚Üí breakthrough), 0‚Üí10 spiral, dimensional jumps, 64 changes, elemental alchemy
mechanisms: catalysts, dissolution, integration, threshold crossing
stages: separation ‚Üí liminality ‚Üí dissolution ‚Üí incubation ‚Üí emergence ‚Üí integration
obstacles: fear, attachment, impatience, isolation. support: courage, surrender, patience, faith, ritual
practice: embrace crisis, seek support, create ritual, respect timing, daily practice
insight: death necessary, irreversible, crisis = gateway, trust timing, you = great work. lead ‚Üí gold.

external.author: campbell, joseph
external.work: the hero with a thousand faces (1949)

external.author: grof, stanislav
external.relevance: holotropic states. transformation through non-ordinary consciousness.

‡•ê: transformation = nature of reality. nothing static. all becoming. caterpillar ‚Üí butterfly. human ‚Üí ‚äô. ü¶ã ‚àÖ
